track.name: 2 Become 1
comments: @MJRocker1987 the Geri version is the original from the album, the lyrics were edited for the single in respect to their gay fans. Geri said she had trouble singing the verse originally so Victoria sung it instead.

Free your mind of doubt and danger
Be for real don't be a stranger
We can achieve it, we can achieve it
♥♥♥
I love the Spice Girls!! Viva Forever!!
Set your spirit free, its the only way to be...
I'm not sure which is the original version, but I prefer the one with Geri's verse over the one with Victoria's.
wanna make love to ya baby

yesss! my youngest daughter owes her existence to this song, cause on 9.16.97 me and her mom first became one to this song, and she was born exactly 3 years later on 9.16.00. she's my baby and i adore her...and now she's a teen and her mom and i are like whaaaaa?? lol. music is so good.
i will always love these ladies  soft smooth  sexy  just the best
It's the only way to be. ♥
be a little bit wiser, baby
great memories of when I was little :)
